column1: The Pit Room////Gotta admit I was skeptical....growing up in the Texas Hill country I know what good brisket is. This place blew me away! Order the two meat plate with brisket and smoked turkey
column2: it'll change your life. Best brisket I've EVER had. Stay away from the potato salad.... I had the pinto beans and coleslaw. Excellent meal
column3: even at almost $17 dollars! If you don't want to stand in line
column4: don't get there at peak lunch/dinner times....we got there Saturday at 3:30 and didn't have to wait. Have also had the frito pie and it's crazy filling for $11!! Would definitely recommend this option if your saving dough and super hungry!
